Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "search and replace text" (#529) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Opened issue "Not able to open VS 2015 solution (Community/Professional) with GitHub" (#554) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
**Description**

While opening VS2015 (Community/Professional), the VS just scans GitHub repo and automatically closes after 10 secs or so.

**Observed**

On Opening VS2015 it is just keeps scanning GitHub repository and then after 10secs or so VS solution closes automatically.

**Expected**

I was able to open the solution since last 8 month after migration from TFSto GitHub.

Merged pull request "Add IComparable<T> and IEquatable<T> to OpenXmlComparableSimpleValue" (#550) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Opened pull request "Add IComparable<T> and IEquatable<T> to OpenXmlComparableSimpleValue" (#550) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Merged pull request "Use a proper cache instead of ConditionalWeakTable" (#549) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
This does not add any invalidation of cache. Future changes should look
at a way to invalidate the cache; no state for a specific instance is
kept in the cache so it would be safe for use across different package
instances.
